Event.name: Explosion
Event.definition:
<def-root>Due to chemical, nuclear, or other reactions, an <fen>Explosive</fen> explodes, potentially causing damage to the surrounding area. The <fen>Explosive</fen> is often, but need not be, a weapon.
<ex><fex name="wea">The bomb</fex> <t>exploded</t> in the middle of the plaza.</ex>
<ex>Nearby, <fex name="wea">a mine</fex> <t>detonated</t>, causing minor damage to the tank.</ex>
<ex>The <fex name="wea">car bomb</fex> <t>explosion</t> left a massive crater.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Explosive
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Explosive</fen> releases a large amount of force, destroying itself and causing damage to the surrounding area.
<ex><fex name="wea">The bomb</fex> <t>exploded</t> in the middle of the plaza.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Victim
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The Victim is targeted by the explosion or inadvertantly damaged by the explosion. Typically expressed by an <m>on</m>-PP.
<ex>The roadside bomb <t>exploded</t> <fex name="vic">on 20 civilians</fex> just outside the central plaza.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Containing_event
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An event that occurs or state of affairs that holds at a time that includes the time during which the explosion occurs and of which it is taken to be a part.
<ex>Several of the rockets <t>detonated</t> <fex name="con">in the blast</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The means by which the <fen>Explosive</fen> explodes.
<ex>The device can <t>detonate</t> <fex name="mea">by remote control</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>A description of the explosion not specifically covered by other Frame Elements.
<ex>The bomb <t>detonated</t> <fex name="man">explosively</fex> in the middle of the square.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The strength of the explosion, or to what degree it damaged the affected areas or objects.
<ex>That morning a <fex name="deg">powerful</fex> <t>explosion</t> rocked the city.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Frequency
Arg.definition:
<def-root>How often an explosion occurs.
<ex>The <fex name="fre">daily</fex> <t>explosions</t> are enough to drive anyone mad.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: explosion.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: an event of a bomb or similar weapon detonating.

lexUnit.name: explode.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: expand rapidly, causing damage and injury.

lexUnit.name: detonation.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the event of an explosive device going off.
